column5: RUBI added under 550 Listened to the conference recordings from last week In great shape for SPO demand manager has the potential to really add meaningful revenue growth EBITDA and most importantly stickiness and consistency to their financial results Buying a techsoftware company with 25 growth and positive adjusted EBITDA at a 15x revenue multiple is a stealAmazon potentially buying Sizmek was mentioned in a positive light to RUBI Taking advantage of this selloff
